entry.title: Open Data - introduction, status in Slovakia and role of Python
entry.summary:
Description

This talk will cover Open Data in three main parts:

  1. Introduction about Open Data will explain the basics (technicalities and licensing), motivation and examples of benefits.
  2. Situation in Slovakia will to some degree cover parts of history, current state and possible outlooks into future.
  3. What role plays Python and people skilled with using Python play in Open Data?
